faqs.question: How can I check the status of my order?
faqs.answer: You can check the status by entering your order ID in the order tracking section or asking the chatbot.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept credit cards, debit cards, bank transfers, and mobile payments.

faqs.question: Do you offer cash on delivery?
faqs.answer: Yes, cash on delivery is available for selected locations.

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: Products can be returned within 14 days if they are unused and in original packaging.

faqs.question: How long does delivery take?
faqs.answer: Delivery usually takes 3â€“7 business days depending on your location.

faqs.question: Do you provide international shipping?
faqs.answer: Currently, we only ship within Sri Lanka.

faqs.question: How can I cancel my order?
faqs.answer: Orders can be canceled before they are shipped. Contact support or use the chatbot to request cancellation.

faqs.question: Can I modify my order after placing it?
faqs.answer: Modifications are possible only before the order is processed.

faqs.question: How do I request a refund?
faqs.answer: Refund requests can be submitted via the returns page or by contacting customer support.

faqs.question: What should I do if I receive a damaged product?
faqs.answer: Please provide photos of the damaged item and packaging, and request a replacement or refund.

faqs.question: Do you sell authentic products?
faqs.answer: Yes, all products sold on our platform are 100% genuine and sourced from authorized distributors.

faqs.question: Can I return electronic items?
faqs.answer: Electronics can be returned only if sealed and unused.

faqs.question: Do you offer warranty on products?
faqs.answer: Most electronics come with a manufacturer warranty. Warranty details vary by brand.

faqs.question: How do I track my delivery?
faqs.answer: A tracking link will be sent to your email and SMS once your order is shipped.

faqs.question: Can I buy items in bulk?
faqs.answer: Yes, bulk orders are accepted. Contact our B2B sales team for discounts.

faqs.question: Do you have a loyalty program?
faqs.answer: Yes, customers earn reward points on every purchase, redeemable on future orders.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can contact us through email, hotline, or the chatbot for immediate assistance.

faqs.question: What if I entered the wrong shipping address?
faqs.answer: Please update the address immediately through customer support before shipping.

faqs.question: Do you offer gift wrapping?
faqs.answer: Yes, gift wrapping is available at checkout for a small fee.

faqs.question: Can I exchange a product?
faqs.answer: Exchanges are allowed within 14 days for unused items with original packaging.

faqs.question: Are there installation services for appliances?
faqs.answer: Yes, installation can be arranged for large appliances such as washing machines or TVs.

faqs.question: Do you provide EMI options?
faqs.answer: Yes, EMI is available for selected banks and credit cards.

faqs.question: What are your delivery charges?
faqs.answer: Delivery is free for orders above USD 100. Standard fees apply for smaller orders.

faqs.question: Can I track my return request?
faqs.answer: Yes, you will receive email updates regarding your return status.

faqs.question: Do you restock out-of-stock products?
faqs.answer: Yes, restocked items will be updated on the product page with a notification option.

faqs.question: How do I apply a discount code?
faqs.answer: You can apply the code at checkout in the 'Coupon Code' section.

faqs.question: Why was my order cancelled automatically?
faqs.answer: Orders may cancel automatically due to payment failure or verification issues.

faqs.question: Can I see my previous orders?
faqs.answer: Yes, all past orders are available in your account dashboard.

faqs.question: What happens if I miss my delivery?
faqs.answer: The courier will attempt delivery again or contact you to reschedule.

faqs.question: Can I request faster delivery?
faqs.answer: Express delivery is available for selected items for an additional fee.

faqs.question: Why is my order delayed?
faqs.answer: Delays can occur due to high demand, weather conditions, or courier issues.

faqs.question: Do you offer student discounts?
faqs.answer: Yes, students can get special discounts by verifying their student ID.

faqs.question: Can I subscribe to product updates?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can click 'Notify Me' on any product page.

faqs.question: How do I change my password?
faqs.answer: Go to account settings and click 'Change Password'.

faqs.question: Do you store my payment information?
faqs.answer: We store payment info securely as per industry standards, or you may choose not to save it.

faqs.question: Is shopping on your site secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, our website uses advanced SSL encryption for secure transactions.

faqs.question: Can I request a digital invoice?
faqs.answer: Yes, a digital invoice is automatically emailed after purchase.

faqs.question: Do you have physical stores?
faqs.answer: We currently operate online only.

faqs.question: Do you price match competitors?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer price matching for selected categories.

faqs.question: Can I reserve an item and pay later?
faqs.answer: Reservation is not available. Items are sold on a first-come basis.

faqs.question: Do you offer subscription products?
faqs.answer: Yes, items like supplements and cosmetics offer auto-renew subscriptions.

faqs.question: Can the courier contact me before delivery?
faqs.answer: Yes, most couriers will call or text before delivery.

faqs.question: What if the price drops after I buy something?
faqs.answer: Price adjustments may be available within 7 days of purchase.

faqs.question: Do you ship fragile items safely?
faqs.answer: Yes, fragile products are shipped with extra protective packaging.

faqs.question: Can I buy gift cards?
faqs.answer: Yes, digital gift cards are available in multiple denominations.

faqs.question: How do I unsubscribe from marketing emails?
faqs.answer: Click the 'Unsubscribe' link at the bottom of any promotional email.

faqs.question: Why is my coupon code not working?
faqs.answer: The code may be expired, invalid, or not applicable to selected items.

faqs.question: Do you offer wholesale pricing?
faqs.answer: Yes, wholesale pricing is available for bulk orders upon request.

faqs.question: What currencies do you support?
faqs.answer: Payments are accepted in USD and LKR depending on your selected region.

faqs.question: Can I get assistance through live chat?
faqs.answer: Yes, our live chat support is available from 9 AM to 11 PM daily.
